SELECT gb.group_buy_no AS groupBuyNo, gb.title, m.nickname, m.image_url AS creatorImageUrl, gb.image_url AS groupBuyImageUrl, gb.in_date AS inDate,
-- 모집 마감일: PERIOD_GROUP_BUYS 테이블의 due_date 컬럼을 VO의 dueDate 필드에 매핑 pgb.due_date AS dueDate,
-- 구매 가능 일수 (DB의 INTEGER 타입, gb.buy_end_date와 VO의 purchasePeriodDays에 매핑) gb.buy_end_date AS purchasePeriodDays,
-- 최종 구매 마감일 계산 (dueDate + purchasePeriodDays) -- MySQL의 DATE_ADD 함수를 사용한다고 가정합니다. DATE_ADD(pgb.due_date, INTERVAL gb.buy_end_date DAY) AS finalPurchaseDeadline,
i.ingredient_name AS ingredientName,
-- 1인당 최소/최대 가격 계산 CEIL((gb.price * (1 + gb.fee_rate / 100)) / pgb.max_participants) AS minPricePerPerson, CEIL((gb.price * (1 + gb.fee_rate / 100)) / 2) AS maxPricePerPerson,
gb.share_location AS shareLocation,
-- 현재 참여 인원 계산: (참여 테이블에서 creator_no와 다른 participant_no 카운트) + 1 (creator_no) COUNT(gbp.group_buy_no) + 1 AS participants, pgb.max_participants AS maxParticipants FROM GROUP_BUYS gb JOIN MEMBERS m ON m.member_no = gb.creator_no JOIN INGREDIENTS i ON i.ingredient_no = gb.ingredient_no JOIN PERIOD_GROUP_BUYS pgb ON pgb.group_buy_no = gb.group_buy_no LEFT JOIN -- 취소되지 않은 참여자만 카운트 대상으로 포함 GROUP_BUY_PARTICIPANT gbp ON gbp.group_buy_no = gb.group_buy_no AND gbp.cancel_date IS NULL AND gbp.participant_no != gb.creator_no WHERE gb.status = 'OPEN'
AND ( gb.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR i.ingredient_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR gb.share_location LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') )
GROUP BY gb.group_buy_no, gb.title, m.nickname, m.image_url, gb.image_url, gb.in_date, pgb.due_date, gb.buy_end_date, i.ingredient_name, gb.price, gb.fee_rate, pgb.max_participants, gb.share_location
ORDER BY
pgb.due_date ASC, gb.in_date DESC
gb.in_date DESC
